templatemaui
Table of Contents

Namespace TemplateMAUI.Controls

Classes

AvatarView

The AvatarView is a custom templated control used to display avatars with various customizable properties such as image source, size, shape, border color, border width, and background color. It provides a flexible and visually appealing way to represent user avatars in your application.

BadgeAnimation
BadgeView

The BadgeView is a custom templated control used to display badges. Badges are commonly used to convey additional information or highlight important content within an application. This control allows for flexible customization and easy integration of badge elements.

BoolPropertyEditor
CarouselItemTransition
CarouselView

The CarouselView is a custom templated control that provides a carousel interface for displaying a collection of views.

ChatBubble

The ChatBubble is a custom templated control designed to display chat messages in a visually appealing bubble format. It provides flexibility for styling and positioning, making it ideal for chat applications.

ComparerThumb
ComparerView

The ComparerView is a custom templated control designed to facilitate the comparison of two items in a visually structured format.

CurrentItemChangedEventArgs
DatePropertyEditor
Divider

The Divider is a custom templated control designed to represent a visual divider in a user interface. It is used to separate content or sections within a layout, providing a clear visual distinction between different parts of the UI.

ElementToBoolConverter
EnumPropertyEditor
GridSplitter

The GridSplitter is a custom templated control designed to provide a way to resize rows or columns in a grid layout. It allows users to dynamically adjust the size of grid elements, enhancing the flexibility and interactivity of the user interface.

Marquee

The Marquee is a custom templated control designed to display scrolling text, that moves across the screen. It is useful for displaying announcements, news tickers, or any other continuously moving content.

NodeDoubleTappedEventArgs
NodeExpandedCollapsedEventArgs
NodeTappedEventArgs
NumberPropertyEditor
PinAnimation

The PinAnimation class implements the IPinAnimation interface, providing custom animations for PIN items. This class defines the behavior for focusing and unfocusing animations using scaling effects on the visual elements.

PinBox

The PinBox is a custom templated control designed to provide a secure input interface for PIN (Personal Identification Number) entry. It is typically used in scenarios where users need to enter a secure code, such as for authentication or verification purposes.

PinCompletedEventArgs

The PinCompletedEventArgs class provides data for the event that occurs when a PIN entry is completed.

PositionChangedEventArgs
ProgressBar

The ProgressBar is a custom templated control designed to visually represent the progress of an operation. It provides a flexible and customizable way to display progress in your application, supporting various styles and configurations.

PropertyEditorBase
PropertyGrid

The PropertyGrid control allows you inspect and edit properties of an object. Allows you to autogenerate all properties or specify the specific properties you want to display.

PropertyItem
PropertyItems
PropertyResolver

The PropertyResolver class is a utility class designed to map types to their corresponding property editor types. This class helps in determining the appropriate editor type for a given data type, facilitating dynamic property editing in user interfaces.

Rate

The Rate is a custom templated control designed to provide a user interface for rating items, such as products, services, or content. It typically displays a series of icons (like stars) that users can select to indicate their rating.

RateItem

The RateItem is a custom templated control designed to represent a single item within a rating control. It provides the visual representation and functionality for individual rating elements, such as stars or other icons, making up the complete rating interface.

ReadOnlyPropertyEditor
ScrolledEventArgs
SegmentedControl

The SegmentedControl is a custom templated control that provides a segmented control interface, allowing users to select from multiple segments or options. It is useful for scenarios where a single choice needs to be made from a set of options.

SegmentedItem

The SegmentedItem is a custom templated control designed to represent an individual item within a segmented control. It provides the visual representation and functionality for each segment, allowing users to interact with and select individual items in a segmented control.

SelectedIndexEventArgs
SelectionChangedArgs
SelectionChangingArgs
Shield

The Shield is a custom templated control designed to provide a decorative or functional shield element in a user interface.

Slider

The Slider is a custom templated control that allows users to select a value from a range of values by moving a thumb control along a track. It provides a flexible and customizable way to input numerical values within a specified range.

SnackBar

The SnackBar is a custom templated control designed to display brief messages or notifications to users. SnackBars typically appear at the bottom of the screen and provide feedback about an operation or offer a quick action for the user to perform.

SnackBarAnimation

The SnackBarAnimation class implements the ISnackBarAnimation interface, providing custom animations for snack bar views. This class defines the behavior for opening and closing animations using translation effects.

SnackBarTimer
StringPropertyEditor
Tag

The Tag is a custom templated control designed to display a tag or label. Tags are often used to categorize content, highlight important information, or provide quick context to items within an application.

ToggleSwitch

The ToggleSwitch is a custom templated control designed to represent a switch that can be toggled on or off. It provides a flexible and customizable way to include toggle functionality in your application, similar to a standard switch control.

ToggledEventArgs
TreeView

The TreeView is a custom templated control that provides a hierarchical structure for displaying data in a tree format. It allows for expandable nodes and is ideal for representing nested data structures such as file systems, and more.

TreeViewChildrenToBoolConverter
TreeViewNode

The TreeViewNode is a custom templated control designed to represent a single node within a tree view control. It provides the visual representation and functionality for individual nodes, allowing users to interact with hierarchical data structures in a tree-like format.

TreeViewNodes
ValueChangedEventArgs

Interfaces

IBadgeAnimation

The IBadgeAnimation interface defines the methods required to implement animations for badge views. This interface allows for custom animations to be applied when a badge appears and disappears.

ICarouselItemTransition
ICarouselViewController

The ICarouselViewController interface defines the methods required to manage touch interactions for a carousel view. This interface provides a way to handle touch events such as starting, changing, and ending touch gestures on a carousel.

IPinAnimation

The IPinAnimation interface defines the methods required to implement animations for PIN items. This interface allows for custom animations to be applied when a PIN item gains or loses focus.

ISnackBarAnimation

The ISnackBarAnimation interface defines the methods required to implement animations for snack bars. This interface allows for custom animations to be applied when a snack bar opens and closes.

Enums

AvatarShape

Represents the possible shapes for an avatar in the AvatarView.

AvatarSize

Represents the possible sizes for an avatar in the AvatarView.

BadgePosition

Represents the possible positions for a badge within a user interface element.

ChatBubbleType

Represents the types of chat bubbles in a chat interface. It is used to differentiate between the messages sent by the user and the messages received from others.

ComparerOrientation

Represents the possible orientations for a comparer view.

DividerOrientation

Represents the possible orientations for a divider in a user interface. This enumeration is used to specify whether the divider should be displayed horizontally or vertically.

GridResizeDirection

Represents the possible directions in which a grid can be resized.

MarqueeDirection

Represents the possible directions for a marquee effect, which is a scrolling display of text or other content.

PropertyEditorType

Represents the different types of property editors that can be used in a PropertyGrid.

SelectionChanged
SelectionMode
SwipeDirection
VisualType

Represents the different visual styles that can be applied to user interface components.
